N174 Goodwin's Celebrities and Prizefighters: Atkinson, Cuerrero, Fitzgerald

Looking for any condition, these are the track and field I am aware of. Would also consider Between the Acts/Bravo pedestrians. I may also consider off-grade cards from other sports as well.

Thanks for looking.

Please send a PM and/or email ehpiiiATaolDOTcom.

Best,
Ed
Ed-This isn't for sale, but I thought I could add to your list. BTW, I am not familiar with the Atkinson--do you have an image?

N174 Goodwin's Celebrities and Prizefighters: Atkinson, Cus Cuerrero, Pat Fitzgerald [note, see pix posted below]

N332 SF Hess : WM Cummins, George Cartwright, Malcolm Ford

Looking for any condition, these are the track and field I am aware of. Would also consider Between the Acts/Bravo pedestrians. I may also consider off-grade cards from other sports as well.

Thanks for looking.

Best,

Hi, lets give this a bump and thanks to OldJudge for the great photos!
